TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit OSFeature extends System.Windows.Forms.FeatureSupport

summary.span: 提供操作系统特定功能查询。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用`static`中提供此类的实例查询操作系统功能的属性。Use the `static` instance of this class provided in the property to query for operating system features. 无法创建此类的实例。You cannot create an instance of this class. 若要确定功能的版本，请调用方法。To determine the version of a feature, call the method. 若要确定是否存在一项功能或特定版本，请调用方法并指定功能来查找此类中提供的功能标识符。To determine if a feature or a specific version is present, call the method and specify the feature to look for with the feature identifiers provided in this class. ## Examples 下面的示例使用查询操作系统以确定如果功能安装。The following example uses to query the operating system to determine if the feature is installed. 该示例提供了两种不同方式检查以查看是否存在该功能。The example presents two different ways of checking to see whether the feature is present. 第一种方法，`myVersion`检查以查看它是否是`null`。In the first method, `myVersion` is checked to see if it is `null`. 如果版本为`null`，未安装的功能。If the version is `null`, the feature is not installed. 在第二个方法中，该示例调用基类方法以查看是否已安装该功能。In the second method, the example calls the base class method to see if the feature is installed. 结果将显示在文本框中。The results are displayed in a text box. 此代码假定`textBox1`已创建并放置在窗体上。This code assumes `textBox1` has been created and placed on a form. [!code-cpp[Classic OSFeature Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic OSFeature Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic OSFeature Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic OSFeature Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic OSFeature Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic OSFeature Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此类无法实例化。This class cannot be instantiated. 若要查询操作系统功能，使用`static`实例中此类提供。To query for operating system features, use the `static` instance of provided in this class.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly Property Feature As OSFeature
public: static property System::Windows::Forms::OSFeature ^ Feature { System::Windows::Forms::OSFeature ^ get(); };

summary.span: 获取 类的 实例进行功能查询。

span.span: Gets a instance of the class to use for feature queries.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此`static`查询操作系统功能的属性。Use this `static` property to query for operating system features. 无法创建此类的实例。You cannot create an instance of this class. 若要确定功能的版本，请调用方法。To determine the version of a feature, call the method. 若要确定是否存在一项功能或特定版本，请调用方法并指定功能来查找此类中提供的功能标识符。To determine if a feature or a specific version is present, call the method and specify the feature to look for with the feature identifiers provided in this class. ## Examples 下面的示例查询为功能。The following example queries for the feature. 版本检查以查看它是否是`null`，以确定是否存在该功能。The version is checked to see if it is `null`, to determine whether the feature is present. 结果显示在文本框中。The result is displayed in a text box. 此代码假定`textBox1`已创建并放置在窗体上。This code assumes `textBox1` has been created and placed on a form. [!code-cpp[Classic OSFeature.GetVersionPresent Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic OSFeature.GetVersionPresent Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic OSFeature.GetVersionPresent Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic OSFeature.GetVersionPresent Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic OSFeature.GetVersionPresent Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic OSFeature.GetVersionPresent Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

param.name: feature
param.span: 请求其版本的功能，为 或 。

summary.span: 检索当前系统上可用的指定功能的版本。

span.span: Retrieves the version of the specified feature currently available on the system.

returns.span: 表示系统上当前可用的指定操作系统功能的版本；如果找不到该功能，则为 。

span.span: A representing the version of the specified operating system feature currently available on the system; or if the feature cannot be found.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性，`static`实例中此类的查询的版本数的一项功能提供。Use the property, the `static` instance of provided in this class, to query for the version number of a feature. ## Examples 下面的示例查询为功能。The following example queries for the feature. 版本检查以查看它是否是`null`，以确定是否存在该功能。The version is checked to see if it is `null`, to determine whether the feature is present. 结果显示在文本框中。The result is displayed in a text box. 此代码假定`textBox1`已创建并放置在窗体上。This code assumes `textBox1` has been created and placed on a form. [!code-cpp[Classic OSFeature.GetVersionPresent Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic OSFeature.GetVersionPresent Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic OSFeature.GetVersionPresent Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic OSFeature.GetVersionPresent Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic OSFeature.GetVersionPresent Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic OSFeature.GetVersionPresent Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public static hidebysig bool IsPresent(valuetype System.Windows.Forms.SystemParameter enumVal) cil managed
Public Shared Function IsPresent (enumVal As SystemParameter) As Boolean

span.span: A representing the feature to search for.

summary.span: 检索一个值，该值指示操作系统是否支持指定的功能或规格。

span.span: Retrieves a value indicating whether the operating system supports the specified feature or metric.

returns.span: 如果功能在系统中可用，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the feature is available on the system; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 通常情况下，使用方法来确定操作系统是否支持特定功能或度量值由标识`enumValue`。Typically, you use the method to determine if the operating system supports the specific feature or metric identified by `enumValue`. 基于从返回的值，你将在你的代码中执行条件操作。Based upon the value returned from , you would perform conditional actions in your code. 例如，如果调用此方法的参数值返回`true`，你可以创建应用程序中的平面样式的所有者描述菜单。For example, if calling this method with a parameter value of returns `true`, you could create owner-drawn menus in your application in a flat style. 如果它们不能在特定操作系统版本上，则访问某些系统功能或度量值可以引发异常。Accessing some system features or metrics can raise exceptions if they are not available on a specific operating system version. 在这种情况下，应首先使用相应枚举值，以及其，以确定是否支持该度量值。In this case, first use the corresponding enumeration value, along with , to determine if the metric is supported. 例如，调用与之前获取属性值。For example, call with before getting the property value. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用方法替换枚举。The following code example demonstrates how to use the method with the enumeration. 该示例可确定是否操作系统支持`CaretWidth`指标之前调用属性。The example determines if the operating system supports the `CaretWidth` metric before calling the property. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.OSFeature.IsPresent#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.OSFeature.IsPresent/CPP/form1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.OSFeature.IsPresent#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.OSFeature.IsPresent/CS/form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.OSFeature.IsPresent#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.OSFeature.IsPresent/VB/form1.vb#1)] [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.OSFeature.IsPresent#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.OSFeature.IsPresent/CPP/form1.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.OSFeature.IsPresent#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.OSFeature.IsPresent/CS/form1.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.OSFeature.IsPresent#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.OSFeature.IsPresent/VB/form1.vb#2)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly LayeredWindows As Object

summary.span: 表示分层的、顶级窗口功能。

span.span: Represents the layered, top-level windows feature.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 分层的窗口可以通过透明的或半透明操作系统。A layered window can be made transparent or translucent by the operating system. 在 Windows 2000 中首先引入了对分层窗口支持。Support for layered windows was first introduced in Windows 2000. 有关详细信息，请参阅"分层 Windows:: 新方式对使用透明度和透明度效果在 Windows 应用程序"中的平台 SDK 文档http://msdn.microsoft.com。For more information, see the "Layered Windows: A New Way to Use Translucency and Transparency Effects in Windows Applications" in the Platform SDK documentation at http://msdn.microsoft.com. 若要确定是否安装了分层的窗口功能，使用属性要调用基类方法与作为要查找的功能。To determine if the layered windows feature is installed, use the property to call the base class method with as the feature to look for. 或者，你可以检查以查看是否通过调用安装该功能方法替换作为要查找的功能。Alternatively, you can check to see if the feature is installed by calling the method with as the feature to find. ## Examples 下面的示例确定当前系统是否支持分层的窗口。The following example determines whether the current system supports layered windows. 基类方法使用调用作为要查找的功能。The base class method is called with as the feature to look for. 结果显示在文本框中。The result is displayed in a text box. 此代码假定`textBox1`已实例化并放置在窗体上。This code assumes `textBox1` has been instantiated and placed on a form. [!code-cpp[Classic OSFeature.LayeredWindows Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic OSFeature.LayeredWindows Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic OSFeature.LayeredWindows Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic OSFeature.LayeredWindows Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic OSFeature.LayeredWindows Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic OSFeature.LayeredWindows Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly Themes As Object

summary.span: 表示操作系统的主题功能。

span.span: Represents the operating system themes feature.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 主题是在 Microsoft Plus 中包括墙纸、 游标、 字体、 声音和首次引入的图标的可视界面设置的集合 ！A theme is a collection of visual interface settings that include wallpaper, cursors, fonts, sounds, and icons first introduced in Microsoft Plus! 对于 Windows 95。for Windows 95. .NET Framework 不直接支持操作主题，尽管它具有对中的视觉样式提供广泛支持命名空间。The .NET Framework does not directly support manipulating themes, although it does have extensive support for visual styles in the namespace. 有关 Windows 主题的详细信息，请参阅主题和视觉样式和 Win32 SDK 中的视觉样式引用的主题。For more information about Windows Themes, see the topics Themes and Visual Styles and Visual Styles Reference in the Win32 SDK. 若要确定是否安装了该功能，调用基类方法与作为要查找的功能。To determine if the themes feature is installed, call the base class method with as the feature to look for. 或者，你可以检查以查看是否通过调用安装该功能方法替换作为要查找的功能。Alternatively, you can check to see if the feature is installed by calling the method with as the feature to find.
